graceGreeting.title: Grace is here to help
graceGreeting.description: Grace is trained on the needs of DBT users, and refined by humans.
graceGreeting.initialMessage: Hello! I'm Grace, your DBT companion. How can I support you today?

quickActions.label: Help using this app
quickActions.followUpMessage: I can help you navigate MindwiseDBT! What specifically would you like help with?

How to navigate between different sections

Support managing my thoughts and urges
